name: PearlLock Slides
description: Paper constructed; CR certified, traditional cigarette style pre-roll slide boxes.
seo_title: PearlLock Slides | Cigarette style pre-roll slide boxes
seo_description: Paper constructed; CR certified, traditional cigarette style pre-roll slide boxes.
first_description: PearlLoc Slides are constructed entirely from paper. Our proprietary process compacts the paper resulting in a strong protective package for your pre-rolls, while its biodegradability makes for an eco-friendly product that helps protect mother earth.
second_description: The PearlLoc Slide box provides a plethora of space for your brand's unique artwork that creates unrivaled visual impact and a memorable impression helping your company stand out at the forefront of the competition.
third_description: Hey, you enjoy having your pre-rolls in pocket, ready and available no matter where you may go, and it's nobody's business what you've got in your box, but you have to admit pulling out a pack like this is gonna give you that James Dean swagger.
